price: 8. morarán en el Infierno como castigo por lo que solían hacer.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
